name: Red
comments: Red raises a roomâ€™s energy level. It has been shown to raise blood pressure, speed respiration, and increase heart rate.

name: Dark Blue
comments: Dark Blue has a calming effect and is often used in bedrooms and bathrooms for its soothing properties. It can also make a room feel more spacious and serene.

name: Yellow
comments: Yellow is a cheerful and sunny color that can brighten up any room. It is often used in kitchens and bathrooms for its ability to create a warm and inviting atmosphere.

name: Gray
comments: Gray is a neutral color that can create a sense of calm and balance in a room. It is often used as a backdrop for bolder, more colorful accents.

name: Purple
comments: Purple is often associated with luxury and royalty. It can add a sense of richness and elegance to a room. It is often used in bedrooms and bathrooms for its calming effect.

name: Green
comments: Green is the color of nature and is often used in living rooms and bedrooms for its calming effect. It can also be used to create a sense of balance and harmony in a room.

name: Orange
comments: Orange is a warm and inviting color that can create a sense of enthusiasm and creativity. It is often used in living rooms, dining rooms, and kitchens for its ability to promote conversation and social interaction.

name: White
comments: White is a clean and crisp color that can create a sense of purity and simplicity. It is often used in bathrooms and bedrooms for its ability to create a serene and tranquil atmosphere. It can also make a room feel more spacious and open.
